data.title: Bed and breakfast in Sarajevo with cozycozy
data.meta_description: Search Sarajevo's bed and breakfast offers on cozycozy! Find the biggest collection, compare easily, and book your perfect stay with just a few clicks.
data.text:

Mahala Guesthouse

B&B - Sarajevo

The Mahala Guest house is located in a quiet residential area of Sarajevo, just a short walk from the lively Baščaršija Square and the Sarajevo Brewery. The guesthouse has received very good user ratings and excellent ratings for its location and cleanliness.

The guest house has a single bedroom and bathroom. Amenities include a terrace, garden, bar, room service, valet parking, free Wi-Fi, cable TV, a kitchen with a fridge and microwave, and air conditioning.

9.6Excellent 7 reviews

Sarajevo

5 7

$129/nighttotal: $1161 (9 )

Guest House Dinka

B&B - Sarajevo

Guest house Dinka is situated in a peaceful neighborhood just outside of Sarajevo's city center, about 3.4 miles from Latin Bridge and 3.8 miles from Sebilj Fountain. It has received excellent ratings for cleanliness and overall experience, with a good rating for its location.

The guesthouse has 7 bedrooms and can accommodate up to 16 guests in its 3660 square feet of space. Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, a terrace with garden views, a barbecue area, free parking, and Wi-Fi.

9.2Excellent 1102 reviews

Sarajevo

1 1

$59/nighttotal: $177 (3 )

Guest House ĆIro

B&B - Sarajevo

Guest House Ćiro is located in Sarajevo, just a short walk from the historic Bascarsija district, home to the Sebilj Fountain and Latin Bridge. This guesthouse has received excellent ratings for location, cleanliness, and user experience.

The guesthouse offers comfortable rooms with private bathrooms and kitchens, allowing guests to prepare their own meals. Guests can enjoy city views from the terrace, relax in the lounge, or take advantage of the free parking, airport shuttle service, and car rental options.

8.8Very good 61 reviews

Sarajevo

5 2

$71/nighttotal: $639 (9 )

Guesthouse Behar

B&B - Sarajevo

Guest house Kašmo is situated in a quiet residential neighborhood of Sarajevo, just a short drive from the historic Old Town and its iconic landmarks. The guesthouse enjoys excellent ratings for cleanliness, location, and overall guest experience.

The property offers two separate apartments, each with a fully equipped kitchen and private balcony, providing ample space for families or groups. Guests can enjoy a range of amenities, including free parking, Wi-Fi, a garden with barbecue facilities, and convenient access to hiking trails and public transportation.

8.0Very good 327 reviews

Sarajevo

5 2

$76/nighttotal: $684 (9 )

Tower House

B&B - Sarajevo

The Tower House is a bed and breakfast located on a hill overlooking the Old Town of Sarajevo, just a short walk from the Baščaršija bazaar and the National Museum. The B&B has received very good ratings for its location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

The Tower House offers a variety of rooms, including private rooms with en-suite bathrooms and dormitories with shared bathroom facilities. Guests can enjoy a terrace or balcony, a garden, free parking, and a kitchen with a fridge.

9.4Excellent 1625 reviews

Guest House Kevser

B&B - Sarajevo

Guest House Kevser is located in Sarajevo, a short walk from the historic Bašćaršija area and close to the Main Bus and Railway Station. The guest house has received excellent ratings for location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

The guest house offers a peaceful garden setting with outdoor seating. Amenities include a shared kitchen, free parking, a washing machine, and easy access to a local grocery store.

8.8Very good 282 reviews

Sarajevo

Hotel Hondo

B&B - Sarajevo

Hotel Hondo is located a 15-minute walk from Sarajevo's center, near the lively Baščaršija district, making it easy to explore the city's main attractions. Guests have consistently rated the hotel very good for its location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

Hotel Hondo offers both rooms and apartments, catering to different needs. Guests can enjoy amenities such as a restaurant, bar, terrace, garden, and tennis court, along with free Wi-Fi and private parking.

9.2Excellent 1156 reviews

Sarajevo

$164/nighttotal: $1476 (9 )

Hotel Kandilj

hotel - Sarajevo

Hotel Kandilj is located in Sarajevo's historic Baščaršija district, within walking distance of landmarks like the Sebilj fountain and the Gazi Husrev-beg Mosque. This lodging option has earned excellent ratings for cleanliness, location, and user experience.

The rooms are decorated with traditional Bosnian art and handicrafts. Guests can enjoy amenities such as free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, a garden, a terrace, and a restaurant.

9.3Excellent 599 reviews

Sarajevo

5 2

$131/nighttotal: $1179 (9 )

Villa Sky

B&B - Sarajevo

Villa Sky is located in Sarajevo, just a short walk from the Sebilj Fountain and Bascarsija Street, the city's historic old town. The guest house has received excellent ratings for location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

Villa Sky offers private rooms with modern amenities, including air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the garden and terrace, relax at the bar, or take advantage of the car rental service and airport shuttle.

9.4Excellent 277 reviews

Sarajevo

$48/nighttotal: $336 (7 )

Guest House Fena

B&B - Sarajevo

Guest House Fena is located in Sarajevo, just a short walk from the famous Sebilj Fountain, Bascarsija Street, and Latin Bridge, immersing you in the city's rich history and vibrant atmosphere. This guesthouse has earned excellent ratings for its cleanliness, location, and overall experience.

Guest House Fena offers a relaxing retreat with a garden, shared lounge, and a fully equipped kitchen for preparing meals. The guesthouse provides a range of amenities, including a hot tub, a picnic area, and a play area for families with children, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

9.1Excellent 1115 reviews

Pigeon Square Rooms

B&B - Sarajevo

Pigeon Square Rooms is located in the heart of Sarajevo's Old Town, just a short walk from the Sebilj Fountain and other major landmarks like the Latin Bridge and Gazi Husrev-beg Mosque. The guesthouse has earned excellent ratings for its cleanliness, location, and overall experience.

Pigeon Square Rooms offers a comfortable and convenient stay in a shared apartment with a kitchen equipped with a fridge and electric kettle. Guests can enjoy free coffee and tea, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and the convenience of an on-site grocery store and bakery.

$479/nighttotal: $1437 (3 )

Vip Apartments

apartment - Sarajevo

This apartment is located in a quiet residential area near Sarajevo Airport, within easy reach of Ilidza Thermal Riviera and Bosna River Spring. It has very good user ratings and excellent location and cleanliness ratings.

The apartment is modern and stylishly furnished, with a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony offering stunning city or mountain views. It also features air conditioning, a concierge, a restaurant, room service, parking, and free Wi-Fi.

9.7Excellent 547 reviews

Guest House Nizama's Place

B&B - Sarajevo

Nizama's Place is a charming bed and breakfast located in Sarajevo, just a short walk from the Sebilj Fountain and the city center, offering a peaceful escape from the bustling city. It has received excellent ratings for its location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

The bed and breakfast features a private terrace, a garden, and a barbecue area, perfect for relaxing and enjoying the outdoors. Amenities include free Wi-Fi, a washing machine, a TV, a fully equipped kitchen, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower.

Guest House Like

B&B - Sarajevo

Guest House LIKE is located in Sarajevo's historic center, just a short walk from Baščaršija, City Hall, and the Miljacka River promenade. The guesthouse has received very good ratings for location, cleanliness, and overall experience.

This bed and breakfast offers a comfortable stay with private bathrooms in every room. Guest House LIKE also provides amenities like a terrace, barbecue facilities, free Wi-Fi, and free parking, making it a convenient and enjoyable choice for travelers.

9.2Excellent 279 reviews

Apartman All Seasons

B&B - Sarajevo

Apartman All Seasons is located in Sarajevo, just a short 5-mile drive from the city center, placing you near the Latin Bridge and Sebilj Fountain, offering a peaceful retreat while still being close to the city's attractions. The property has received excellent ratings for cleanliness and location, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable stay.

The apartment offers 540 square feet of space, accommodating up to 5 guests in its two bedrooms and one bathroom. Amenities include a swimming pool, tennis court, and a fully equipped kitchen, along with a terrace, garden, and spa, providing a variety of options for relaxation and entertainment.

A Charming Hotel In The Historical Location

B&B - Sarajevo

Accommodation for up to 16 people with an excellent rating of 93% based on 3 reviews. You will be located in Sarajevo.

Facilities and services include free parking, a jacuzzi and a kitchen. Take advantage of the gym in this accommodation in Sarajevo.

2bdr Apt With Balcony With View- Free Parking

B&B - Sarajevo

This Sarajevo B&B is located just 3 miles from the Latin Bridge and Sebilj Fountain, offering easy access to the city's historic center. The property boasts excellent user ratings, a good location rating, and a very good cleanliness rating.

The 1,020 square foot apartment has 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, comfortably accommodating up to 5 guests. Amenities include a fully equipped kitchen, free Wi-Fi, a private balcony with city views, and free parking.

9.9Excellent 26 reviews

Sarajevo

$139/nighttotal: $973 (7 )

Guest House Gaj Sarajevo

B&B - Sarajevo

Guest House Gaj Sarajevo is located in the Bascarsija district, just an 8-minute walk from Sebilj Fountain and a short distance from the lively Bascarsija Street. The guest house enjoys excellent ratings for cleanliness, location, and overall experience.

The guest house offers two bedrooms, a dining area, a kitchenette, and a bathroom, providing enough space for up to four guests. You can enjoy a garden, free parking, and Wi-Fi, and the property is close to the Sarajevo War Tunnel.

Sarajevo

$39/nighttotal: $117 (3 )

Pre

B&B - Sarajevo

This Sarajevo bed and breakfast is conveniently located just a short walk from the Sarajevo Cable Car and City Hall, placing you in the heart of the city's vibrant cultural scene. The surrounding area is rich with historical landmarks and offers easy access to the city's main attractions.

This charming guesthouse features a comfortable bedroom and bathroom, perfect for a relaxing stay. Guests can enjoy the convenience of a private terrace, free Wi-Fi, and parking, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable experience.
